title: Ariadne Sofa
description:
The Ariadne sofa is fit for royalty! The platinum finish of the wooden frame complements the lustrous upholstery over button-tufted seatback and armrests. Carved flourishes crown the arched seatbacks and extend down the molding around the high shelter armrests. Accent pillows with floral patterns are included.

title: Miyeon Sofa
description:
A new addition to Acme's collection of exclusive designs, the Miyeon sofa in cherry finish is full of handsome details. Nailhead trim along the padded seat base runs up the scrolled arms and arched seatbacks. Button tufting on the seatback makes the fabric upholstery look especially cozy. Raised floral motifs embellish the Queen Anne legs of the piece.
